external_games.name: NHRA Championship Drag Racing: Speed for All - Electro Blitz Pack

name: NHRA Championship Drag Racing: Speed for All - Electro Blitz Pack
summary: Featuring eye-catching neon circuitry laid-to-black, the Electro Blitz Pack is loaded with a Top Fuel Car, a Driver's Suit, a Parachute, and a Vehicle-Hauler each with a design sure to be noticed.
